# GitHub Copilot Instructions - Project Management via MCP

## 🎯 Project Overview & Context

This repository contains **project-management-via-mcp**, a comprehensive project management system that integrates GitHub Projects with Model Context Protocol (MCP). When interacting with this project, always maintain awareness of the following context:

### Repository Information
- **Repository**: `namnh240795/project-management-via-mcp`
- **Owner**: namnh240795 (Nam Nguyễn)
- **Primary Branch**: main
- **GitHub Project**: Project #6 (https://github.com/users/namnh240795/projects/6)
- **Project Status**: Active development, Phase 1 in progress
- **Last Context Update**: October 15, 2025

### Project Architecture & Goals
- **Primary Goal**: Create seamless GitHub Projects integration via MCP
- **Technology Stack**: TypeScript, Node.js, GitHub APIs, MCP
- **Development Approach**: 4-phase structured development
- **Target Users**: Development teams, project managers, GitHub users
- **Key Features**: Automated workflows, project tracking, team collaboration

## 🔧 Technical Context

### MCP Integration Specifics:
- **Model Context Protocol** is the core integration technology
- **GitHub Projects API** for project management features
- **Real-time synchronization** between GitHub and MCP
- **Automated workflow triggers** based on project events
- **Cross-platform compatibility** for various development environments

### GitHub Projects Integration:
- **Project #6** is the primary management interface
- **5 configured field types** for comprehensive tracking
- **Multiple view types** for different management needs
- **Automated status updates** via GitHub Actions (planned)
- **Team collaboration features** integrated with GitHub

### Development Standards:
- **TypeScript** for type safety and maintainability
- **ESLint + Prettier** for code consistency
- **Jest** for unit testing framework
- **GitHub Actions** for CI/CD pipeline
- **Semantic versioning** for releases
